name: Vine MA – Email Marketing, Forms, Interactive Bot Forms, Chatbot, Analytics
author: Vine Oy

sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘vine’
  3. Activate Vine from your Plugins page
  4. Login by using MA account at the plugin settings page
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Vine account

There is no option to use it without account
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

  • Use new script path /vscript/* instead of /track/*. Compatibility with WordPress 6.4

1.2.0

  • Use CDN also for the main script

1.1.7

  • Allow automatic script blocking for cookie consent

1.1.6

  • Avoid multiple organizations accounts to login

1.1.5

  • Fixed compatibility issue with DIVI editor

1.1.4

  • Support CookieBot automatically without any configuration

1.1.3

  • Support older WP versions

1.1.2

  • Bugfixing

1.1.1

  • Some bugfixing

1.1.0

  • MA Login added to plugin settings. Not necessary to enter the organization ID manually.
  • Vine Web Form Gutenberg Block added to editor. Just insert the block and select a Vine Form.

1.0.0

  • Initial Public Release
sections.description: Vine is a Marketing automation tool that helps you generate better leads from your web site visitors and gradually convert them into buying customers. It includes Web site visitor tracking , web forms (including interactive bot forms), landing pages, AI chatbot (including live chat) , email marketing, automated workflows, thorough analytics, and integration with Vine CRM or third party tools.

short_description: Vine is a Marketing automation tool that helps you generate better leads from your web site visitors and gradually convert them into buying customers.
